Title: Enacts "CJ's law" in relation to increasing the penalties for leaving the scene of an accident without reporting where such accident resulted in the death of a minor
Summary: Enacts "CJ's law" in relation to increasing the penalties for leaving the scene of an accident without reporting where such accident resulted in the death of a minor to a class C felony punishable by a fine of not less than four thousand nor more than eight thousand dollars in addition to any other penalties provided by law.
LawCode: Amd ยง600, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to increasing the penalties for leaving the scene of an accident without reporting where such accident resulted in the death of a minor
